sentence: Either by, as we've seen in Georgia or the incumbent governor, Brian Kemp is running a strong campaign against Trump endorsed primary opponent, former Senator David Perdue just going right at them.
title: The Downballot: The battle for state legislatures in 2022, with Jessica Post (transcript)
